incident_description:
Between 00:11 UTC and 01:32 UTC December 17, 2025, customers may have experienced failures or delays when provisioning classic compute resources for interactive or job workloads.

The incident is now closed. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you require further details about this incident, please submit a support ticket or contact help@databricks.com.

Our investigation has confirmed that this issue did not impact the Databricks service. 

We are closing this incident and apologize for any confusion.

incident_name: US Gov West 1 - Multiple services (Service Disruption)
incident_description:
Between 23:51 UTC on December 3 and 01:00 UTC on December 4, 2025, customers may have experienced a complete outage, with all Databricks services presumed unavailable during this period.

The incident is now closed. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you require further details about this incident, please submit a support ticket or contact help@databricks.com.
